classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, D2, and Upper-Division D. Upper-Division B, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E. Quarterly advisor meetings are recommended prior to registration.

Select five courses from the following Integrated Learning Course (ILC) topics. At least three (3) different ILCs must be chosen. (ILCs are repeatable up to 12 units.) LA431, LA432, LA433, LA434, LA435, LA436, LA437, LA438, LA439. Select only one Focus Studio course each quarter to be taken concurrently with an Integrated Learning Course (ILC).

Select five courses from the following Integrated Learning Course (ILC) topics. At least three (3) different ILCs must be chosen. (ILCs are repeatable up to 12 units.) LA431, LA432, LA433, LA434, LA435, LA436, LA437, LA438, LA439. Select only one Focus Studio course each quarter to be taken concurrently with an Integrated Learning Course (ILC).
Select one course from the following: BIO227, BRAE337, SS120, STAT217 or STAT218. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.
